title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the neural training assistant, including target users (e.g., athletes, students, professionals), desired features (e.g., personalized training plans, progress tracking, biometric data integration), performance goals (e.g., response time, scalability), and any constraints or limitations (e.g., data privacy, regulatory compliance).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the AI and neural stimulation components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations such as security, privacy, and regulatory compliance.
dependencies: Conduct Risk Assessment and Regulatory Compliance Review

title: Develop AI and Machine Learning Models
description: Research, design, and develop the AI and machine learning models for physical and mental performance enhancement.

title: Implement Neural Stimulation Interface
description: Develop the hardware and software components for interfacing with neural stimulation devices.

title: Build User Interface and Experience
description: Design and develop the user interface and experience for the neural training assistant, including user onboarding, personalization, and feedback mechanisms.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management systems for user data, training data, and system logs.

title: Establish Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement security and privacy measures to protect user data and ensure system integrity, including encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan, including unit tests, integration tests, user acceptance testing, performance testing, security testing, and accessibility testing. The plan should cover all components of the system, including the frontend, backend, and any third-party integrations. Ensure that the plan addresses testing for different environments (e.g., development, staging, production) and considers edge cases, error handling, and scalability.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the neural training assistant, covering installation, configuration, and usage instructions.
